faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Doppler VPN

what.question: What is Doppler VPN?
what.answer: Doppler VPN is a privacy-focused virtual private network service that encrypts your internet connection and hides your IP address. It includes built-in ad blocking, content filtering by category, and support for custom blocklists - all without requiring registration.

noLogs.question: Is Doppler VPN really no-logs?
noLogs.answer: Yes, we operate a strict no-logs policy. We don't track, store, or share any of your browsing activity, connection timestamps, IP addresses, or any other personal data. Your privacy is our priority.

adBlocker.question: How does the ad blocker work?
adBlocker.answer: Our ad blocker works at the DNS level, blocking ads, trackers, and malicious domains before they even load. This means faster browsing, less data usage, and protection across all your apps - not just your browser.

categories.question: What content categories can I filter?
categories.answer: You can filter content across multiple categories including adult content, gambling, social media, gaming, streaming, and more. You can also import custom blocklists for additional content filtering control.

devices.question: How many devices can I use?
devices.answer: A single Doppler VPN subscription covers up to 10 devices simultaneously. Use it on your phones, tablets, and computers - all protected at once.

platforms.question: What platforms are supported?
platforms.answer: Doppler VPN is available on iOS (iPhone & iPad), macOS, and Android. We're constantly working on expanding our platform support.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel your subscription anytime through your device's app store (App Store for iOS/macOS or Google Play for Android). Your access continues until the end of your billing period. You will not be charged after cancellation.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Yes! Every new user gets a 7-day free trial with full access to all Premium features. The trial converts to a paid subscription unless canceled at least 24 hours before it ends. We also offer a 30-day money-back guarantee.

whatIsIncluded.question: What is included in Premium?
whatIsIncluded.answer: Premium includes VPN servers in 50+ locations with WireGuard encryption, DNS-level ad blocker that works across all apps, content filter with parental controls, and connection on up to 10 devices simultaneously.

plans.question: What subscription plans are available?
plans.answer: We offer three plans: Monthly, 6-Month, and Yearly. All plans include the same Premium features. Longer plans offer a lower per-month price. Subscriptions auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the billing period.

restore.question: I subscribed but my features aren't working
restore.answer: Open the app, go to Profile > Subscription and tap Restore Purchases. This will re-sync your subscription with our servers. If the issue persists, contact our support team at support@simnetiq.store or contact @DopplerSupportBot on Telegram.

refund.question: How do I request a refund?
refund.answer: Refunds are processed by Apple or Google. For iOS, visit reportaproblem.apple.com and sign in with your Apple ID. For Android, open Google Play > Account > Order history. Refunds are typically processed within 48 hours.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Doppler VPN, your privacy is our top priority. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your information when you use our VPN, ad blocking, and content filtering services.

noLogs.title: No-Logs Policy
noLogs.content: We operate a strict no-logs policy. We do not track, store, or share any of the following: your browsing activity, connection timestamps, originating IP addresses, DNS queries, bandwidth usage, or any other data that could identify you or your online activities. VPN traffic is encrypted end-to-end and is never inspected, logged, or stored.

collect.title: What We Collect
collect.content: We only collect the minimum information necessary to provide our service: a randomly generated device identifier (not linked to your personal identity), payment information (processed securely by Apple App Store or Google Play — we never see your payment details), anonymous aggregated server load statistics to maintain performance, and your email address only if you voluntarily contact support.

vpnData.title: VPN Data Handling
vpnData.content: When you connect to our VPN service, your internet traffic is encrypted using the WireGuard protocol and routed through our servers. We do not inspect, log, store, modify, or sell any data that passes through our VPN tunnel. Our DNS-level ad blocker and content filter operate on our DNS resolver and do not log individual queries or browsing patterns.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We use industry-standard encryption protocols including WireGuard to protect your connection. All data transmission between your device and our servers is encrypted end-to-end. Our server infrastructure is configured to minimize data retention by design.

thirdParty.title: Third Parties
thirdParty.content: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties. We use RevenueCat for subscription management (they process only anonymous purchase identifiers) and Apple/Google app stores for payment processing. These providers are bound by their own privacy policies and contractual obligations.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our content filtering feature includes parental control capabilities. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. The content filter operates at the DNS level without collecting or storing any personal data about users of any age.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@dopplervpn.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Doppler VPN, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: Doppler VPN provides a virtual private network service that encrypts your internet connection and hides your IP address for privacy purposes. The service also includes DNS-level ad blocking and content filtering with parental controls. The service is provided "as is" and "as available."

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree to use Doppler VPN only for lawful purposes and in compliance with all applicable local, national, and international laws. You may not use the service for any illegal activities, to circumvent geo-restrictions or content licensing agreements, to harm others, to distribute malware, to infringe on intellectual property rights, or to interfere with our service operations. We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms.

subscription.title: Subscriptions & Payments
subscription.content: Doppler VPN Premium includes access to premium VPN servers in 50+ locations, DNS-level ad blocking, content filtering with parental controls, and connection on up to 10 devices simultaneously. Subscriptions are billed through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store. Plans are available on a monthly, 6-month, or annual basis and auto-renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period. You can cancel your subscription at any time through your device's app store settings. Refunds are subject to the respective app store's refund policies.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Doppler VPN shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from your use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes through the app or via email. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@dopplervpn.com
